Hero.title: Premium Apparel Manufacturing
Hero.subtitle: We provide high-quality garment manufacturing and export services to global brands. From design to delivery, we are your trusted partner in fashion.

Features.title: Why Choose Us
Features.subtitle: Everything you need to scale your fashion brand
Features.qualityDesc: Strict quality control at every stage of production ensuring zero defects.
Features.logisticsDesc: Efficient shipping solutions to over 50 countries with real-time tracking.
Features.materialsDesc: Sourcing the finest fabrics and accessories from certified suppliers.

Footer.description: Premium quality apparel manufacturer and exporter. Connecting global fashion brands with top-tier manufacturing.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for inquiries and quotes.
Contact.name: Name
Contact.success: Thank you for your inquiry! We will get back to you soon.

About.title: About Us
About.description: FashionExport is a premier garment manufacturer dedicated to bringing your fashion vision to life. Since 2009, we have been the silent partner behind many successful global fashion brands.

values.qualityDesc: We maintain the highest standards of quality control at every stage of production, ensuring that every garment meets international standards.
values.customerDesc: Our clients are our partners. We work closely with brands to understand their vision and deliver products that exceed expectations.
values.globalDesc: With a robust logistics network, we ensure timely delivery of products to any corner of the globe.
values.heritageDesc: Built on a legacy of craftsmanship, we combine traditional techniques with modern technology.

Process.title: How We Work
Process.subtitle: Our Manufacturing Process
Process.description: From concept to final delivery, we ensure transparency and quality at every step of the manufacturing journey.

steps.consultationDesc: We work with you to understand your requirements, brand identity, and target market. Our design team creates technical sketches and mood boards.
steps.sourcingDesc: We source the best fabrics and trims that match your quality and price requirements. Prototypes are created for your approval.
steps.planningDesc: Once samples are approved, we plan the production timeline, allocate resources, and ensure all materials are ready.
steps.manufacturingDesc: Our skilled workforce begins the cutting and sewing process using modern machinery to ensure precision and consistency.
steps.qcDesc: Every garment undergoes rigorous inspection at multiple stages. We check for measurements, stitching, and overall finish.
steps.deliveryDesc: We handle packaging, labeling, and export documentation. Your order is shipped via air or sea freight to your destination.

Sustainability.title: Sustainability
Sustainability.description: Fashion doesn't have to cost the earth. We are dedicated to reducing our environmental footprint and promoting ethical manufacturing.

initiatives.materialsDesc: We prioritize the use of organic cotton, recycled polyester, and biodegradable fabrics. Our sourcing team constantly researches new sustainable alternatives.
initiatives.waterDesc: Our dyeing and finishing facilities utilize advanced water treatment and recycling systems to minimize water usage and pollution.
initiatives.wasteDesc: We implement zero-waste cutting techniques and recycle textile scraps. Our goal is to achieve zero landfill waste by 2030.
initiatives.laborDesc: We are committed to providing safe working conditions and fair wages. Our factories are regularly audited for social compliance.
